description: Students are assigned to a full-time internship in schools under the guidance of a
competent cooperating teacher and supervised by faculty from both the content area
department and the Education Department. Student teaching provides the best possible
introduction to the teaching experience. Student teachers practice all classroom teaching
skills required to assure competency to begin their first-year of teaching. Minimum of 14
full-time weeks teaching, including orientation sessions and required seminars.  Only student
teachers may enroll: seniors or college graduates. Offered each semester.
